body:
Daniel,

I believe that EnergyPlus requires a minimum of 1 warmup day and, if the warmup conditions do not converge to a stable value in the warmup period, E+ gives you a severe error to tell you that you simulation is probably wrong.  That is why we write the default values in if you put in warmup days that are <= 0.

I haven't checked the E+ Input/Output reference enough to know if there is a way to plug in custom conditions for the warmup period:

[http://bigladdersoftware.com/epx/docs/8-0/input-output-reference/](http://bigladdersoftware.com/epx/docs/8-0/input-output-reference/)

If you find something in there that sounds like it will do what you want, let us know and I can try to implement it in Honeybee.

I am not sure which attachment you are referring to in your most recent post.

-Chris
